attributes.additional_details: recruitment agencies messing people about 1 minute they have work then they don't have work for 1 week 2 week 3 week so on so what do you do you cant afford to pay rent electric gas food etc they is no more work so you make a claim (apply for a loan) because you are struggling again the benefit claim witch takes about 4 weeks to start running and by that time your agency will ring and say are you available for work so you have to shut down your claim lose money and this repeats you never get full time work because this benefits agency's and company's we are left in the dumps we need to do something about this and stop being walked all over!!!!!!!!!!!!
